headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LAZARUS, MORTIMOR C.

snippet: LAZARUS--Mortimor C.,Jr. Beloved husband of Elaine, father of Todd and Drew, grandfather of Kyra, Amanda, Matthew and Claire. Loved and missed by all. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: LAZARUS--Mortimor C.,Jr. Beloved husband of Elaine, father of Todd and Drew, grandfather of Kyra, Amanda, Matthew and Claire. Loved and missed by all. 1/3
